Name: name
Description: The name of your project. The site will be based off this name

Name: ext
Description: This is the extension you want your site to have.

Name: os
Description: Two operating systems are supported, ubuntu and centos.

Name: php
Description: This will download the PHP version you want and get most of the modules you will need.

Name: gituser
Description: Define the global git user so you can get on with development straight away.

Name: gitemail
Description: This includes the email for your account too.

Name: subdomain
Description: If you want your site to have a subdomain then here we are.
